summary: JUST BOUGHT A USED 2000  DODGE DURANGO SLT. THE POWER LOCKS ONLY WORK ON 3 OUT OF 5 DOORS PROPERLY. WHEN I USE THE POWER LOCKS THEY LET OUT A HIGH PITCHED GRINDING NOISE. I AM AFRAID MY KIDS MAY BECOME LOCKED INSIDE THE CAR AND BE UNABLE TO GET OUT DUE TO THE PROBLEM WITH THE POWER LOCKS.  *NLM
